data.name: Shifter
data.detailed_description:
Shifter is set in a world, where everyone has a microchip attached to their brain, allowing peoples brains to be literally hacked, even during sleep….


Please, Join to Shifter's Discord server by clicking the image above.

Shifter is a rogue-lite game featuring a gravity-shifting mechanic. It has 3 different areas with unique boss fights. Use various weapons such as swords, scythes, and shotguns to escape your dream, which has been hacked and turned into a twisted game. Shifter is made by Niilo Hanni, a solo dev from Finland.



Shifter is a fun rogue-lite game, where you can walk on walls and shift gravity. In Shifter, your dream gets hacked through a microchip in your brain. You have to kill three beasts in your dream world to wake up.


The game is different every time you play, and the world is generated randomly so that in every run, the game feels like a different experience.


In Shifter, you can use lots of different and cool weapons from melee weapons to guns. Shifter also has awesome animations!


In Shifter, you’re going to experience at least three areas. Each of which has different boss battles. In every boss fight, you have to somehow take advantage of the gravity-shifting mechanic of the game. Look at this example of a boss fight below:
